channel.title: Mummy Points
channel.description: I want to make something like Saradomin Points but enstead of Saradomin, Mummy Points, but I also want to keep Saradomin Points aswell, I tried Copying the Saradomin Points thing and renaming it but I would get errors.

item.title: Mummy Points
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

in player.java
add this int
public int mummyKills = 0;

and then add this in client.java in
public int loadmoreinfo() {

in case 1:

} else if (token.equals("character-mummyKills")) { mummyKills = Integer.parseInt(token2);

then scroll down to this

public boolean savemoreinfo() {

then add

characterfile.write("character-mummyKills = ", 0, 23); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(mummyKills), 0, Integer.toString(mummyKills).length()); characterfile.newLine();

there you have it

the points will save

Read full topic
